api_list.name: Login
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://capsulink.p.rapidapi.com/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "capsulink.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create a new link
api_list.description: Shorten a URL and get it's data
